EmailTemplate.name: 201710_DubaiAirShow_AAGE_Invitation_NJM.201710_DubaiAirShow_AAGE_Invitation_Emai
EmailTemplate.subject: You're Invited: Aviation Annual Gala Evening 2017
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Let's Make Some Waves!
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Valued partner}},
As a truly valued partner, Honeywell Aerospace invites you to join us for an evening on the calm waters of the Arabian Gulf. We appreciate your business and the support you continue to provide Honeywell and invite you to join us at the Aviation Annual Gala Evening.
The Aviation Annual Gala Evening is an annual celebration for senior aviation leaders, which this year will take place on a luxurious mega yacht berthed in the Dubai Marina. This invite only event will take place during Dubai Air Show and promises to be one of the highlights of the week. The event will be split into two sessions; the first an exclusive drinks reception, guest welcome and international gourmet buffet. This will be followed by an amazing cruise along Dubai’s shoreline, with captivating views of the famous Palm Island, the Dubai skyline and Iconic buildings such as the Burj Al Arab.
Date: Tuesday, November 14th
Time: 19:00 - 23:00 (Cruise Departs at 20:30)
Venue: Pier 7, Dubai Marina
I hope you will be able to join us for this memorable event and allow us to thank you for your continued support. To confirm your attendance, please use the link below.
Nick Maynard Channel Partner Marketing Manager Honeywell Aerospace
CLICK HERE TO REGISTER <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/AAGE_Registration.html]]>
Our company is committed to integrity and upholding the highest ethical values. In compliance with our own policies and procedures on offering hospitality and in line with global anti-bribery and corruption laws, the Intent and purpose of this invitation is to build and maintain strong business relationships with you and your company and is expressly not offered with any expectation in respect of obtaining or seeking to obtain undue influence or advantage.
We are providing you with these invitation details to enable your acceptance in compliance with your own company polices. If you require any additional information or have any concerns, please let us know
